changeSet.author: Jon.Lent
changeSet.createProcedure:
CREATE PROCEDURE Insurance.SelectAllTypesOfVerificationRules AS BEGIN
SELECT TypeId AS Oid, Description FROM Insurance.VerificationRuleTypes ORDER BY Description END;
changeSet.rollback: REVOKE EXECUTE ON Insurance.SelectAllTypesOfVerificationRules FROM db_apionly; DROP PROCEDURE Insurance.SelectAllTypesOfVerificationRules;
